divs: Sighting Detailswe were up stairs at 9 10pm a glowing ball slowly passed threw our room it went north to south it seemed to be a liquid typ of blue white energy bubble it passed so close to me i tried to touch it but itaccelerated just enough to avoid my hand still going perfectly straight it was drpping illumanated droplets that vanished into thin air befor they fell coud hit the bed i have thought about thisdaily itwas rigt in my face never seen nothin like it we were lucky maby we told 3peapl about it an we dont talk to no one else but our kids anymore ya ll can call me any one else see it a ball in a bubble it passed thrue stucco sheetrock that have never been touchedwe dont stay up there no more it did not even slow it down we saw it come in and leave
Summary: glowing ball passed thru walls north tosouth 2ft in front of us dripin sparkles it passed slowly i tried to touch it but sped up just exactly enough tro avoid me we will tell you all if you call we have never looked at stucco or sheetrock in side the wal
